Reviews.Title: A Great Gift for My Wife
Reviews.Author: Jamie
Reviews.Content: For a pocket camera, it takes great pictures. My wife uses it constantly and loves it. The ability to send pictures to another device via WIFI is very handy. The price was very reasonable and the shipping was quick. The 4 Gig SD card is small by todays standards, but is a 10, and the case works well.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung WB150F Smart Wi-Fi Digital Camera Deluxe Bundle With 4 GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card, Digpro Compact Camera Deluxe Carrying Case, Cleaning Kit WHITE
